name: Demo Platformer
description:
Just a small demo of a game I am making.

Arrows - To move and double jump
Left Ctrl - To crouch for invisibility
Z - To attack
X - To spawn swords
C - To perform gather and spin attack with swords
R - To restart

All credits of Music/Art assets that are not mine belong to their respective owners, will give proper credit inside the game when it is complete.
